PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-10652013-10-09HC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectBlood Regulations
PrecisBLOOD Regulations in order to introduce under the Food and Drugs Act new stand-alone regulations specific for blood and its components intended for transfusion or further manufacturing into human drugs. The regulations will provide Health Canada’s final response to the Krever Commission recommendations, and at the same time meet the broader departmental commitment to modernise regulations that have become outdated.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0178 Publication Date: 2013-10-23
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Blood Regulations
precis: BLOOD Regulations in order to introduce under the Food and Drugs Act new stand-alone regulations specific for blood and its components intended for transfusion or further manufacturing into human drugs. The regulations will provide Health Canada’s final response to the Krever Commission recommendations, and at the same time meet the broader departmental commitment to modernise regulations that have become outdated.
